definition: (interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin

sentences.english: Ms. Roman says she still remembers the first images that it captured.
sentences.chinese: 羅曼女士表示，她至今仍記得哈勃捕獲的第一張圖像。

sentences.english: They first saw it in a Hubble photo taken on June twenty-eighth.
sentences.chinese: 他們第一次看到它在六月二十八對哈勃望遠鏡的照片。

sentences.english: Hubble left the Mount Wilson Observatory during World War Two.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃於二戰中離開威爾遜山天文臺的職位。

sentences.english: The Hubble telescope orbits about five hundred fifty kilometers above Earth. Ms.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃望遠鏡的軌道在地球上空約一百五十五個公里。

sentences.english: Pictured above by the Hubble Space Telescope are about 100, 000 of M72's stars.
sentences.chinese: 上面是哈勃太空望遠鏡拍的M72中約10萬顆恆星。

sentences.english: The Hubble Space Telescope has photographed many pairs of galaxies colliding.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃太空看遠鏡拍攝了很多對撞在一起的星系。

sentences.english: Surveys with the Hubble Space Telescope (HST)are finding BHs in every galaxy that has an elliptical-galaxy -like "bulge" component.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃太空望遠鏡的觀測表明黑洞存在於每個星系之中。

sentences.english: Thee shuttle Endeavour will be taking the astronauts to the Hubble.
sentences.chinese: 斁“奮進”號航天飛機將把宇航員送上哈勃望遠钂。

sentences.english: The galaxies in the cluster are clearly visible in the Hubble and VLT images.
sentences.chinese: 在哈勃和VLT圖像中，超星系團中的星系清晰可見。

sentences.english: The Hubble Space Telescope uses a CCD as its main imaging device.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃空間看遠鏡就是使用CCD作爲主要成像設備。

sentences.english: Using Hubble data, astronomers were able to describe the black-hole system.
sentences.chinese: 天文學家們可以使用哈勃數據來描繪這種黑洞系統。

sentences.english: The Hubble's primary mirror, nearly eight feet across.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃望遠鏡的主鏡直徑將近8英尺。

sentences.english: John Grunsfeld, an astronaut who flew on the most recent Hubble sevicing mission.
sentences.chinese: 這個人執行了哈勃最近一次任務。

sentences.english: Each telescope's contribution is presented in a different color:- Yellow represents the near-infrared observations of Hubble.
sentences.chinese: 黃色代表了近紅外的哈勃望遠鏡觀測。
嘿，我的名字叫哈勃麗特。

sentences.english: Kalas led the team using Hubble to discover Fomalhaut's planet.
sentences.chinese: 卡那斯領導使用哈勃來探索北落師門行星的小組。

definition: Johannes Kepler (1571-1630), German astronomer and formulator of Kepler's laws of planetary motion
